chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
R: relation T

Goal:
minimal_element_property -> well_founded R

Premises:
well_founded : forall A : Type, (A -> A -> Prop) -> Prop
minimal_element_property = forall S : Ensemble T, Inhabited S -> exists x : T, In S x /\ (forall y : T, In S y -> ~ R y x) : Prop
relation = fun A : Type => A -> A -> Prop : Type -> Type Arguments relation _%type_scope
Acc_intro_generator : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), nat -> well_founded R -> well_founded R
Wf_nat.well_founded_inv_rel_inv_lt_rel : forall (A : Set) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), well_founded (Wf_nat.inv_lt_rel A F)
Wf_nat.well_founded_gtof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (Wf_nat.gtof A f)
Wf_nat.well_founded_ltof : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat), well_founded (Wf_nat.ltof A f)
Wf_nat.well_founded_inv_lt_rel_compat : forall (A : Set) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (F : A -> nat -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> Wf_nat.inv_lt_rel A F x y) -> well_founded R
Wf_nat.well_founded_lt_compat : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (R : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> f x < f y) -> well_founded R
well_founded_induction_type : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Type, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
Fix : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Type, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall x : A, P x
well_founded_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Prop, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
well_founded_induction : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall P : A -> Set, (forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x) -> forall a : A, P a
well_founded_induction_type_2 : forall (A B : Type) (R : A * B -> A * B -> Prop) (P : A -> B -> Type), well_founded R -> (forall (x : A) (x' : B), (forall (y : A) (y' : B), R (y, y') (x, x') -> P y y') -> P x x') -> forall (a : A) (b : B), P a b
WF_implies_MEP = fun (WF : forall a : T, Acc R a) (S : Ensemble T) (Hinh : Inhabited S) => match Hinh with | Inhabited_intro _ _ x H => well_founded_ind WF (fun x0 : T => In S x0 -> exists y : T, In S y /\ (forall z : T, In S z -> ~ R z y)) (fun (x0 : T) (H0 : forall y : T, R y x0 -> In S y -> exists y0 : T, In S y0 /\ (forall z : T, In S z -> ~ R z y0)) (H1 : In S x0) => match classic (forall y : T, In S y -> ~ R y x0) with | or_introl H2 => ex_intro (fun y : T => In S y /\ (forall z : T, In S z -> ~ R z y)) x0 (conj H1 H2) | or_intror H2 => let...
Fix_F_inv : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop), well_founded R -> forall (P : A -> Type) (F : forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x), (forall (x : A) (f g : forall y : A, R y x -> P y), (forall (y : A) (p : R y x), f y p = g y p) -> F x f = F x g) -> forall (x : A) (r s : Acc R x), Fix_F P F r = Fix_F P F s
Wf_nat.lt_wf = Wf_nat.well_founded_ltof nat (fun m : nat => m) : well_founded lt
Fix_eq : forall (A : Type) (R : A -> A -> Prop) (Rwf : well_founded R) (P : A -> Type) (F : forall x : A, (forall y : A, R y x -> P y) -> P x), (forall (x : A) (f g : forall y : A, R y x -> P y), (forall (y : A) (p : R y x), f y p = g y p) -> F x f = F x g) -> forall x : A, Fix Rwf P F x = F x (fun (y : A) (_ : R y x) => Fix Rwf P F y)
PeanoNat.Nat.gt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => m < n <= z)
PeanoNat.Nat.lt_wf : forall z : nat, well_founded (fun n m : nat => z <= n < m)
BinNat.N.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.lt m n /\ BinNat.N.le n z)
BinNat.N.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.N, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.N => BinNat.N.le z n /\ BinNat.N.lt n m)
BinInt.Z.gt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.lt m n /\ BinInt.Z.le n z)
BinInt.Z.lt_wf : forall z : BinNums.Z, well_founded (fun n m : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.le z n /\ BinInt.Z.lt n m)
Relation_Operators.union : forall A : Type, relation A -> relation A -> A -> A -> Prop
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> P y x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall a a0 : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_sym_trans A R a a0 -> P a a0
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x : A, P x x) -> (forall x y z : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x y -> P x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_refl_trans A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_sind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> SProp), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a
Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n_ind : forall (A : Type) (R : relation A) (P : A -> A -> Prop), (forall x y : A, R x y -> P x y) -> (forall x y z : A, R x y -> Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R y z -> P y z -> P x z) -> forall x a : A, Relation_Operators.clos_trans_1n A R x a -> P x a

```coq
intros Hmin S HS.
apply (Hmin S HS).
Qed.
